mapper.select: select e_no as eNo, e_name as eName, s_no as sNo, s_name as sName, examCard from (examiners left join exam on examiners.e_id=exam.e_id) left join stu on examiners.s_id=stu.s_id
select e_no as eNo, e_name as eName, s_no as sNo, s_name as sName, examCard from (examiners left join exam on examiners.e_id=exam.e_id) left join stu on examiners.s_id=stu.s_id where ex_id=#{ex_id}

select e_no as eNo, e_name as eName, s_no as sNo, s_name as sName, examCard from (examiners left join exam on examiners.e_id=exam.e_id) left join stu on examiners.s_id=stu.s_id where e_no=#{no} or e_name like #{name}
mapper.insert: insert into examiners ( examCard, s_id, e_id ) values ( #{examCard}, #{sId}, #{eId} )
